p: We next demonstrated that BMECs are not only permissive to productive ZIKV infection, but these cells also produce infectious viral particles. Supernatants from ZIKV-H-infected BMECs were collected at 2 dpi and used to infect na√Øve Vero cells. Infection was detected by a plaque assay using an agarose overlay and crystal violet staining ( Figure 1D).
